text: This Bud's for You... is an album by saxophonist Bud Shank which was released on the Muse label.Bud Shank discography accessed July 2, 2015Muse Records discography accessed July 2, 2015 ==Reception== Scott Yanow of Allmusic stated, "Bud Shank's playing from this recording forward surprised many listeners. There was a forcefulness and a passion to his alto solos (he had given up the flute) that had not been heard that much from him previously". == Track listing == # "I'll Be Seeing You" (Sammy Fain, Irving Kahal) - 4:57 # "Nica's Dream" (Horace Silver) - 5:04 # "Never Never Land" (Betty Comden, Adolph Green, Jule Styne) - 5:38 # "Spacemaker" (Walter Norris) - 3:30 # "Visa" (Charlie Parker) - 5:28 # "Cotton Blossom" (Bud Shank) - 4:44 # "Bouncing with Bud" (Bud Powell) - 4:10 == Personnel == * Bud Shank - alto saxophone * Kenny Barron - piano * Ron Carter - bass * Al Foster - drums == References == Category:Bud Shank albums Category:1985 albums Category:Muse Records albums
